connect20/perception_bannerpro.name: connect20/Perception_Bannerpro

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/perception_bannerpro.description: All in One Banner Pro Extension allows you to manage unlimited banners with list of sliding effects with attractive and effective look of site Home page.
